name: Mass General Brigham
description: Mass General Brigham, based in Boston, Massachusetts, is an integrated academic healthcare system founded by Massachusetts General Hospital and Brigham and Women’s Hospital. Its Harvard-affiliated teaching hospitals are consistently ranked among the best in the United States and globally, with thousands of physicians serving as Harvard Medical School faculty. For more than 200 years, Mass General Brigham has led in medical research and patient care, home to 14 Nobel laureates and the largest hospital-based research enterprise in the country. More than 3,700 clinical trials are underway, driving innovations that benefit over 2.6 million patients each year.Patients from more than 120 countries come to Mass General Brigham for advanced treatments, complex surgeries, and rare disease expertise. For over 25 years, its international collaborations across 40 countries have strengthened health systems, improved clinical quality, and enhanced patient outcomes. Working alongside patients, providers, and institutions worldwide, the international team fosters collaboration and innovation to advance healthcare transformation and address the most complex medical and system challenges.Stay informed about the latest updates from Mass General Brigham’s International team - sign up for our Newsletter today or follow us on LinkedIn.
htmlDescription:
Mass General Brigham, based in Boston, Massachusetts, is an integrated academic healthcare system founded by Massachusetts General Hospital and Brigham and Women’s Hospital. Its Harvard-affiliated teaching hospitals are consistently ranked among the best in the United States and globally, with thousands of physicians serving as Harvard Medical School faculty.

For more than 200 years, Mass General Brigham has led in medical research and patient care, home to 14 Nobel laureates and the largest hospital-based research enterprise in the country. More than 3,700 clinical trials are underway, driving innovations that benefit over 2.6 million patients each year.

Patients from more than 120 countries come to Mass General Brigham for advanced treatments, complex surgeries, and rare disease expertise. For over 25 years, its international collaborations across 40 countries have strengthened health systems, improved clinical quality, and enhanced patient outcomes.

Working alongside patients, providers, and institutions worldwide, the international team fosters collaboration and innovation to advance healthcare transformation and address the most complex medical and system challenges.

Stay informed about the latest updates from Mass General Brigham’s International team - sign up for our Newsletter today or follow us on LinkedIn.

name: Dexcom Middle East and Africa
description: Dexcom is a US based company with more than 25 years of experience in continuous glucose monitoring systems personalized to met the unmet need of people living with diabetes with diversified portfolio offering. We are proud to say we are pioneering the continuous glucose monitoring industry with more than 75 years between research and development and launching the first CGM in 1999.In 2024, We expanded our leadership to be present in Middle East and Africa represented in regional headquarters in Riyadh and attracted top talents in the healthcare market.Empowering people to take control of healthTo know more about us, you can meet us at our booth location H1A.K50
htmlDescription:

name: DANA-FARBER CANCER INSTITUTE
description: Dana-Farber Cancer Institute, a Harvard Medical School teaching affiliate, is a global leader in cancer care and research. Ranked among the top cancer centers in the world, Dana-Farber provides cutting-edge treatments, pioneering clinical trials, and compassionate care to patients from more than 130 countries. Through its International Patient Services and global collaborations, the Institute extends its expertise beyond Boston—advancing cancer prevention, early detection, and precision medicine worldwide.We look forward to connecting with you.
htmlDescription:

Ranked among the top cancer centers in the world, Dana-Farber provides cutting-edge treatments, pioneering clinical trials, and compassionate care to patients from more than 130 countries. We look forward to connecting with you.

name: Polytec
description: At Polytec, precision isn’t just a standard — it’s a foundation for discovery.From measuring the vibration of a single cell to mapping the 3D surface of implant materials, our technologies help researchers and engineers see what others can’t.Vibrometer — Capturing Life in MotionOur Laser Doppler Vibrometers (LDV) measure vibration, displacement, and dynamic behavior with nanometer precision — completely contact-free.In the medical and life science fields, vibrometry provides a new window into biomechanics and regenerative medicine, enabling:Characterization of cartilage, bone, and soft tissue dynamicsEvaluation of implant material performanceNon-destructive testing of delicate biological samplesBy translating mechanical behavior into measurable data, vibrometry empowers researchers to better understand how biological materials move, respond, and heal.TopMap Surface Metrology — Seeing Surfaces in 3DOur TopMap White-Light Interferometers (WLI) deliver accurate, non-contact 3D surface topography — from the micro-scale to the macro.In medical device development, TopMap systems are used to:Analyze implant roughness and surface texture for improved biocompatibilityMeasure microfluidic channels in lab-on-a-chip devicesEnsure precision sealing and bonding in disposable diagnostic cartridgesWhen surface quality defines performance and safety, TopMap ensures every curve, peak, and valley meets the highest standard.
htmlDescription:
At Polytec, precision isn’t just a standard — it’s a foundation for discovery.

From measuring the vibration of a single cell to mapping the 3D surface of implant materials, our technologies help researchers and engineers see what others can’t.


Vibrometer — Capturing Life in Motion

Our Laser Doppler Vibrometers (LDV) measure vibration, displacement, and dynamic behavior with nanometer precision — completely contact-free.

In the medical and life science fields, vibrometry provides a new window into biomechanics and regenerative medicine, enabling:

  • Characterization of cartilage, bone, and soft tissue dynamics
  • Evaluation of implant material performance
  • Non-destructive testing of delicate biological samples

By translating mechanical behavior into measurable data, vibrometry empowers researchers to better understand how biological materials move, respond, and heal.


TopMap Surface Metrology — Seeing Surfaces in 3D

Our TopMap White-Light Interferometers (WLI) deliver accurate, non-contact 3D surface topography — from the micro-scale to the macro.

In medical device development, TopMap systems are used to:

  • Analyze implant roughness and surface texture for improved biocompatibility
  • Measure microfluidic channels in lab-on-a-chip devices
  • Ensure precision sealing and bonding in disposable diagnostic cartridges

When surface quality defines performance and safety, TopMap ensures every curve, peak, and valley meets the highest standard.

name: EFFY
description: EFFY is a global provider of enterprise business efficiency intelligence solutions powered by innovative and disruptive technology like Advanced Analytics, Generative AI, Hyperautomation complemented by our expert business consulting experience.  We focus on improving enterprise efficiency, correcting operational deficits, and maximizing revenue, empowering our clients across multiple industries to collect, analyse, review and compare massive amounts of operational and financial details across the entire business chain.

name: bioMérieux
description: A world leader in the field of in vitro diagnostics since 1963, bioMérieux is present in 45 countries and serves more than 160 countries with the support of a large network of distributors. In 2024, revenues reached €4 billion, with over 93% of international sales (outside of France).bioMérieux provides diagnostic solutions (systems, reagents, software, services) which determine the source of disease and contamination to improve patient health and ensure consumer safety. Its products are mainly used for diagnosing infectious diseases. They are also used for detecting microorganisms in food, pharmaceutical and cosmetic products.bioMérieux is listed on the Euronext Paris stock market.
htmlDescription:
A world leader in the field of in vitro diagnostics since 1963, bioMérieux is present in 45 countries and serves more than 160 countries with the support of a large network of distributors. In 2024, revenues reached €4 billion, with over 93% of international sales (outside of France).

bioMérieux provides diagnostic solutions (systems, reagents, software, services) which determine the source of disease and contamination to improve patient health and ensure consumer safety. Its products are mainly used for diagnosing infectious diseases. They are also used for detecting microorganisms in food, pharmaceutical and cosmetic products.

bioMérieux is listed on the Euronext Paris stock market.

name: INGENIERIA Y TECNICAS CLINICAS SA
description: At ITC, we have spent more than 36 years putting our expertise and knowledge at the service of healthcare. We specialize in medical equipment for medical gas supply, and every one of our products reflects the perfect combination of high quality, precision, and reliability.We manufacture pressure regulators, vacuum regulators, ball flowmeters, dial flowmeters, gas outlets for ambulances and hospitals, as well as custom-made hospital Bed head units (BHU), fully tailored to each client’s needs. We take pride in our ability to manufacture in all major international standards—BS, CGA, DIN, NF, Ohmeda, among others—and even specific regulations such as CM, ensuring our devices integrate seamlessly into any healthcare environment worldwide.If you are looking for medical solutions to regulate flow, control pressure, or provide gas outlets for medical gases such as oxygen, nitrous oxide, medical air, carbon dioxide, nitrogen, and more, ITC is your trusted partner. We also offer custom-made hospital BHU and a full range of high-, medium-, and low-vacuum regulators, essential for safe and efficient medical suction management.Our commitment is clear: to deliver excellence, backed by a company that combines superior quality with competitive pricing, so that every hospital project benefits from the technology and safety it deserves.
htmlDescription:
At ITC, we have spent more than 36 years putting our expertise and knowledge at the service of healthcare. We specialize in medical equipment for medical gas supply, and every one of our products reflects the perfect combination of high quality, precision, and reliability.


We manufacture pressure regulators, vacuum regulators, ball flowmeters, dial flowmeters, gas outlets for ambulances and hospitals, as well as custom-made hospital Bed head units (BHU), fully tailored to each client’s needs. We take pride in our ability to manufacture in all major international standards—BS, CGA, DIN, NF, Ohmeda, among others—and even specific regulations such as CM, ensuring our devices integrate seamlessly into any healthcare environment worldwide.


If you are looking for medical solutions to regulate flow, control pressure, or provide gas outlets for medical gases such as oxygen, nitrous oxide, medical air, carbon dioxide, nitrogen, and more, ITC is your trusted partner. We also offer custom-made hospital BHU and a full range of high-, medium-, and low-vacuum regulators, essential for safe and efficient medical suction management.


Our commitment is clear: to deliver excellence, backed by a company that combines superior quality with competitive pricing, so that every hospital project benefits from the technology and safety it deserves.

name: Simplex Information Technologies Inc
description: Simplex Information Technologies Inc., based in Ankara University Technopolis, is a highly specialized information technology company focused on industrial internet applications within the healthcare sector.Simplex delivers genuine value by delivering innovative industrial software platforms and applications for the healthcare sector. The company aims to become a global leader by developing products that are both scalable and sustainable.“We help you enhance your performance by optimizing patient workflow effectively.”Key examples of our solutions include teleradiology systems that expand access to medical imaging, clinical decision support tools that optimize procedure selection, management systems that streamline clinical workflows, and operational surveillance systems that enable proactive healthcare management.Simplex’s strengths lie in its experienced and skilled leadership, its willingness to take calculated risks, and a highly educated, innovative workforce that embraces change and drives excellence.
htmlDescription:
Simplex Information Technologies Inc., based in Ankara University Technopolis, is a highly specialized information technology company focused on industrial internet applications within the healthcare sector.

Simplex delivers genuine value by delivering innovative industrial software platforms and applications for the healthcare sector. The company aims to become a global leader by developing products that are both scalable and sustainable.

“We help you enhance your performance by optimizing patient workflow effectively.”

Key examples of our solutions include teleradiology systems that expand access to medical imaging, clinical decision support tools that optimize procedure selection, management systems that streamline clinical workflows, and operational surveillance systems that enable proactive healthcare management.

Simplex’s strengths lie in its experienced and skilled leadership, its willingness to take calculated risks, and a highly educated, innovative workforce that embraces change and drives excellence.

name: DUKA&DUCHA MAKINA KIMYA KAPLAMA MEDIKAL SAN.TIC.LTD.STI
Shirley Ryan Ability Lab
United Imaging
description: Shanghai United Imaging Healthcare Co., Ltd. (“UIH”) is a member of the United Imaging Healthcare Technology Group Co., Ltd., which is dedicated to providing, developing and producing high-performance advanced medical imaging, radiotherapy equipment, life science instruments and offering intelligent digital solutions to customers worldwide. UIH was founded in 2011 and headquartered in Shanghai, and has subsidiaries and R&D centers across China, the United States, Malaysia, Colombia, United Arab Emirates, Netherlands and other parts of the world.UIH has a world-class talent team including more than 140 scientists with global experience and more than 600 employees with rich R&D and management experience in the medical industry. And 40% of 8,400+ employees are R&D personnel. UIH has launched over 140 ground-breaking products, including Total-Body PET/CT, HD TOF PET/MR, Whole-body UHF 5T MR, 75cm Ultra-Wide Bore 3.0T MR, 640-Slice CT Scanner, and Fully Integrated CT-linac. All core technologies are developed in house and have been globally or nationally recognized for world-leading performance.  UIH products have been installed in over 15,300 medical and research institutes in nearly 90 countries, including the U.S., Italy, Germany, France, India, Australia, New Zealand, Poland, Japan, Korea, Malaysia, the United Arab Emirates, etc. UIH topped China’s 2024 market share rankings in the PET/CT, CT and DXR sectors.
htmlDescription:
Shanghai United Imaging Healthcare Co., Ltd. (“UIH”) is a member of the United Imaging Healthcare Technology Group Co., Ltd., which is dedicated to providing, developing and producing high-performance advanced medical imaging, radiotherapy equipment, life science instruments and offering intelligent digital solutions to customers worldwide. UIH was founded in 2011 and headquartered in Shanghai, and has subsidiaries and R&D centers across China, the United States, Malaysia, Colombia, United Arab Emirates, Netherlands and other parts of the world.


UIH has a world-class talent team including more than 140 scientists with global experience and more than 600 employees with rich R&D and management experience in the medical industry. And 40% of 8,400+ employees are R&D personnel.


UIH has launched over 140 ground-breaking products, including Total-Body PET/CT, HD TOF PET/MR, Whole-body UHF 5T MR, 75cm Ultra-Wide Bore 3.0T MR, 640-Slice CT Scanner, and Fully Integrated CT-linac. All core technologies are developed in house and have been globally or nationally recognized for world-leading performance.


UIH products have been installed in over 15,300 medical and research institutes in nearly 90 countries, including the U.S., Italy, Germany, France, India, Australia, New Zealand, Poland, Japan, Korea, Malaysia, the United Arab Emirates, etc. UIH topped China’s 2024 market share rankings in the PET/CT, CT and DXR sectors.

name: Kenaaz United for Trading
description: Kenaaz United For Trading, founded in 2007,  is a leading medical devices and life science solution provider specialized in diagnostic laboratories. Kenaaz United is exclusively providing the Saudi market through a group of worldwide leaders of global manufacturers. Kenaaz United employs experienced sales team in each region supported by highly qualified biomedical engineers who provide a full range of after sales services to satisfy every client's needs and to insure that the clients are fully trained to operate the equipment as per manufacturer standards.
htmlDescription:

name: Jiangsu Trade Promotion International Conference & Exhibition Co., Ltd
Rameem Medical Company
description: Rameem Medical Company is a Saudi Arabia–based manufacturer specializing in orthopedic implants. The company is headquartered in Al Khobar, Saudi Arabia. Rameem positions itself as the first local manufacturer of titanium orthopedic implants in the Kingdom, contributing directly to Saudi Arabia’s growing medical device industry and supporting the national drive for industrial localization under Saudi Vision 2030.Rameem’s vision is to become the leading orthopedic implant manufacturer in Saudi Arabia by 2030. Its mission centers on providing high-quality, safe, and technologically advanced medical devices through innovation, research collaboration, and adherence to international standards. The company works closely with hospitals, universities, and government agencies to develop products that meet both local and global medical needs, while nurturing Saudi talent in high-precision manufacturing and biomedical engineering.The company manufactures a comprehensive range of orthopedic implants, including systems for the upper and lower limbs, plates, screws, and fixation devices. These products are produced using biocompatible materials such as medical-grade titanium, ensuring patient safety and long-term durability. Rameem’s product portfolio is continuously expanding to include new business lines such as spine, arthroplasty, maxillofacial, and dental implants, reflecting its ambition to cover the full spectrum of orthopedic and reconstructive care.Rameem has strengthened its market position through strategic partnerships, most notably with Zahrawi Group, one of the region’s leading medical distributors. Under this agreement, Zahrawi serves as the exclusive distributor for Rameem’s trauma portfolio in Saudi Arabia. This collaboration enhances Rameem’s access to hospitals and healthcare institutions across the Kingdom, enabling broader market penetration and stronger brand recognition.Despite its achievements, Rameem faces challenges typical of advanced manufacturing in the medical field. These include sourcing high-quality raw materials such as medical-grade titanium, achieving and maintaining certifications like ISO 13485, and complying with Saudi Food and Drug Authority (SFDA) requirements. However, the company views these challenges as opportunities for growth and continuous improvement, aiming to position itself as a regional hub for medical implant innovation and export.Looking ahead, Rameem Medical Company’s strategy focuses on scaling production capacity, diversifying product lines, and entering new global markets. By aligning with Saudi Vision 2030’s industrial and healthcare objectives, Rameem not only supports the Kingdom’s self-sufficiency in medical manufacturing but also contributes to raising the overall standard of healthcare in the region. With a commitment to “quality first” and a patient-centric approach, Rameem stands as a pioneering force in the advancement of Saudi Arabia’s medical device industry.
htmlDescription:
Rameem Medical Company is a Saudi Arabia–based manufacturer specializing in orthopedic implants. The company is headquartered in Al Khobar, Saudi Arabia. Rameem positions itself as the first local manufacturer of titanium orthopedic implants in the Kingdom, contributing directly to Saudi Arabia’s growing medical device industry and supporting the national drive for industrial localization under Saudi Vision 2030.

Rameem’s vision is to become the leading orthopedic implant manufacturer in Saudi Arabia by 2030. Its mission centers on providing high-quality, safe, and technologically advanced medical devices through innovation, research collaboration, and adherence to international standards. The company works closely with hospitals, universities, and government agencies to develop products that meet both local and global medical needs, while nurturing Saudi talent in high-precision manufacturing and biomedical engineering.

The company manufactures a comprehensive range of orthopedic implants, including systems for the upper and lower limbs, plates, screws, and fixation devices. These products are produced using biocompatible materials such as medical-grade titanium, ensuring patient safety and long-term durability. Rameem’s product portfolio is continuously expanding to include new business lines such as spine, arthroplasty, maxillofacial, and dental implants, reflecting its ambition to cover the full spectrum of orthopedic and reconstructive care.

Rameem has strengthened its market position through strategic partnerships, most notably with Zahrawi Group, one of the region’s leading medical distributors. Under this agreement, Zahrawi serves as the exclusive distributor for Rameem’s trauma portfolio in Saudi Arabia. This collaboration enhances Rameem’s access to hospitals and healthcare institutions across the Kingdom, enabling broader market penetration and stronger brand recognition.

Despite its achievements, Rameem faces challenges typical of advanced manufacturing in the medical field. These include sourcing high-quality raw materials such as medical-grade titanium, achieving and maintaining certifications like ISO 13485, and complying with Saudi Food and Drug Authority (SFDA) requirements. However, the company views these challenges as opportunities for growth and continuous improvement, aiming to position itself as a regional hub for medical implant innovation and export.

Looking ahead, Rameem Medical Company’s strategy focuses on scaling production capacity, diversifying product lines, and entering new global markets. By aligning with Saudi Vision 2030’s industrial and healthcare objectives, Rameem not only supports the Kingdom’s self-sufficiency in medical manufacturing but also contributes to raising the overall standard of healthcare in the region. With a commitment to “quality first” and a patient-centric approach, Rameem stands as a pioneering force in the advancement of Saudi Arabia’s medical device industry.

name: Twareat
description: TMC Health stands today as one of the leading integrated healthcare operations in Saudi Arabia providing comprehensive medical operations across remote, industrial, and urban environments.From education and urgent care beginnings to managing industrial, offshore, and mega oil & gas projects, TMC Health has built a legacy of reliability, innovation, and medical excellence.Our services now span remote medical operations, emergency response, polyclinics, homecare, medical transportation, and industrial health programs, supported by advanced systems, strong governance, and dedicated expertise.As we enter 2026, we continue expanding through subsidiaries in logistics, pre-hospital solutions, and vehicle conversions; reinforcing our mission to shape the future of healthcare operations in the Kingdom and beyond.
htmlDescription:
TMC Health stands today as one of the leading integrated healthcare operations in Saudi Arabia providing comprehensive medical operations across remote, industrial, and urban environments.

From education and urgent care beginnings to managing industrial, offshore, and mega oil & gas projects, TMC Health has built a legacy of reliability, innovation, and medical excellence.

Our services now span remote medical operations, emergency response, polyclinics, homecare, medical transportation, and industrial health programs, supported by advanced systems, strong governance, and dedicated expertise.

As we enter 2026, we continue expanding through subsidiaries in logistics, pre-hospital solutions, and vehicle conversions; reinforcing our mission to shape the future of healthcare operations in the Kingdom and beyond.

name: Yuwell Medical
description: Since its establishment in 1998, Yuwell Medical, listed on the Shenzhen Stock Exchange (002223.SZ), has been a leading provider of healthcare products and service solutions in China, adhering to the mission of "alleviate patients' suffering and enhance doctors' medical capabilities". Yuwell is determined to become one of the top three medical device groups in the global out-of-hospital market. In 2024, the company generated over $1 billion in revenue and serves 10 medical fields, including respiratory therapy, diabetes management, infection control, AEDs, surgical devices, and traditional Chinese medicine, and others. With 9 state-of-the-art R&D centers, 7 advanced production facilities, and 4 international subsidiaries outside China, Yuwell’s global presence spans over 100 countries. The company supports more than 300,000 healthcare institutions and benefits 300 million households worldwide. As a global leader in home healthcare medical devices, Yuwell is dedicated to transforming lives worldwide through accessible, high-quality medical technology. Our mission extends beyond products - we're building an ecosystem that addresses the evolving needs of medical professionals and patients everywhere, advancing inclusive healthcare solutions that bridge gaps in medical access. Through continuous innovation and strategic partnerships, Yuwell is driving meaningful progress in worldwide health development, empowering people around the world to lead healthier, more fulfilling lives.
htmlDescription: Since its establishment in 1998, Yuwell Medical, listed on the Shenzhen Stock Exchange (002223.SZ), has been a leading provider of healthcare products and service solutions in China, adhering to the mission of "alleviate patients' suffering and enhance doctors' medical capabilities". Yuwell is determined to become one of the top three medical device groups in the global out-of-hospital market. In 2024, the company generated over $1 billion in revenue and serves 10 medical fields, including respiratory therapy, diabetes management, infection control, AEDs, surgical devices, and traditional Chinese medicine, and others. With 9 state-of-the-art R&D centers, 7 advanced production facilities, and 4 international subsidiaries outside China, Yuwell’s global presence spans over 100 countries. The company supports more than 300,000 healthcare institutions and benefits 300 million households worldwide. As a global leader in home healthcare medical devices, Yuwell is dedicated to transforming lives worldwide through accessible, high-quality medical technology. Our mission extends beyond products - we're building an ecosystem that addresses the evolving needs of medical professionals and patients everywhere, advancing inclusive healthcare solutions that bridge gaps in medical access. Through continuous innovation and strategic partnerships, Yuwell is driving meaningful progress in worldwide health development, empowering people around the world to lead healthier, more fulfilling lives.

name: New Medical Imaging Co., Ltd
description: New Medical Imaging (NMI) is a leading provider of state-of-the-art Indirect Radiography Solutions to hospitals and healthcare centers worldwide, specializing in the design and manufacture of DR Retrofit Solutions based on TFT Flat Panel Technology.Since our inception two decades ago, our close liaison with Radiology departments worldwide to understand their requirements has been a key differentiation and a driving force behind our innovation, bringing DR solutions that are affordable, easy to install, and achieve high standards in patient care.NMI is also the Taiwan office of Vieworks, which is the top 3 FPD manufacturer in the global rankings.
htmlDescription:
New Medical Imaging (NMI) is a leading provider of state-of-the-art Indirect Radiography Solutions to hospitals and healthcare centers worldwide, specializing in the design and manufacture of DR Retrofit Solutions based on TFT Flat Panel Technology.


Since our inception two decades ago, our close liaison with Radiology departments worldwide to understand their requirements has been a key differentiation and a driving force behind our innovation, bringing DR solutions that are affordable, easy to install, and achieve high standards in patient care.


NMI is also the Taiwan office of Vieworks, which is the top 3 FPD manufacturer in the global rankings.

name: Galaxy International Venture
description: We are engaged in marketing and selling pharmaceutical products, medicines, medical supplies, consumables, and advanced medical equipment. Through our customer network, we have gained a competitive advantage in establishing information technology software and RCM software to have partnerships with numerous global and local suppliers to cover all aspects of healthcare and meet the local market’s needs by offering a selected range of high-quality, competitively priced products and services.We provide high-quality medical equipment to numerous hospitals, aiming to offer comprehensive solutions for various hospital departments. This is achieved by supplying the latest innovations, technological solutions, and premium specifications from the best global brands (USA, Germany, Thailand, Malaysia, China, and the Far East), to meet the needs of healthcare providers across the Kingdom.With over 10 years of experience in the Saudi market, particularly in the medical field, and our ability to adopt the latest administrative and technical methods in selecting highly trained personnel across various fields, we ensure that your needs are met through long-term contracts evaluated with modern performance indicators. This guarantees that your operational levels remain at peak productivity while maintaining cost stability, which plays a significant role in calculating profit margins.

Through our customer network, we have gained a competitive advantage in establishing information technology software and RCM software to have partnerships with numerous global and local suppliers to cover all aspects of healthcare and meet the local market’s needs by offering a selected range of high-quality, competitively priced products and services.

We provide high-quality medical equipment to numerous hospitals, aiming to offer comprehensive solutions for various hospital departments. This is achieved by supplying the latest innovations, technological solutions, and premium specifications from the best global brands (USA, Germany, Thailand, Malaysia, China, and the Far East), to meet the needs of healthcare providers across the Kingdom.

With over 10 years of experience in the Saudi market, particularly in the medical field, and our ability to adopt the latest administrative and technical methods in selecting highly trained personnel across various fields, we ensure that your needs are met through long-term contracts evaluated with modern performance indicators. This guarantees that your operational levels remain at peak productivity while maintaining cost stability, which plays a significant role in calculating profit margins.

name: National Informatics Company (NITCO)
description: NITCO, a national information technology company headquartered in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia,and with a branch in Egypt, specializes in providing high-quality information technologysolutions with the help of a group of experienced engineers in information technology.Our goal is to provide software solutions and services tailored to meet therequirements and needs of our clients.NITCO was established 34 years ago in 1990 in response to the steady commercialgrowth in the Arabian Gulf and the Middle East, which in turn requires efficient, cost effective, and reliable software services. We strive to attract distinguished talents and nurture promising minds by providing them with in-depth expertise in the fields of artificial intelligence and data analysis.The company was founded by Mr. Khalid bin Khalaf Al-Dehan, aiming to bridge the gapin the healthcare sector, which at the time relied on paper-based methods. He took it upon himself to spread electronic culture in the healthcare sector, not only for commercial success but also in pursuit of technology itself. The company has defined its mission as contributing to supporting the transformation of the healthcare sector from paper-based to digital through investment in software development. The company is now led by a group of young Saudi and Arab talents who have taken on the responsibility of continuing the company's journey, achieving its vision, and activating its mission.At NITCO, we offer you  you the tools to achieve your goals. We spare no effort in providing you with the latest technology in the field of software solutions. We constantly strive to prove our worth in becoming your trusted and cost-effective technology partner. We are confident that we will exceed your expectations once we get the opportunity, as we always strive to build long-term relationships with our clients.

We are confident that we will exceed your expectations once we get the opportunity, as we always strive to build long-term relationships with our clients.

name: Johns Hopkins Aramco Healthcare
description: For many years, Johns Hopkins Medicine– a globally respected academic health body – and Saudi Aramco– one of the world’s largest energy companies – have led the way in our respective fields. So when, in 2013, we joined forces to create a brand-new health service for Saudi Aramco employees and their dependents – expanding on the capabilities of the company’s long-established medical facilities – we knew an exciting future was in store.   As well as offering a comprehensive range of inpatient and outpatient services at our various clinics, we are dedicated to overcoming the health challenges faced by the communities we serve, organizing regular outreach events to encourage more beneficial lifestyle choices.We now look forward to the next stage of our journey. Inspired by our combined commitment to grow and learn, we are confident that JHAH will continue to deliver outstanding healthcare for many generations to come.
htmlDescription:
For many years, Johns Hopkins Medicine– a globally respected academic health body – and Saudi Aramco– one of the world’s largest energy companies – have led the way in our respective fields. So when, in 2013, we joined forces to create a brand-new health service for Saudi Aramco employees and their dependents – expanding on the capabilities of the company’s long-established medical facilities – we knew an exciting future was in store.

As well as offering a comprehensive range of inpatient and outpatient services at our various clinics, we are dedicated to overcoming the health challenges faced by the communities we serve, organizing regular outreach events to encourage more beneficial lifestyle choices.

We now look forward to the next stage of our journey. Inspired by our combined commitment to grow and learn, we are confident that JHAH will continue to deliver outstanding healthcare for many generations to come.

name: Cedars-Sinai
description: Cedars-Sinai is a nonprofit academic medical center and a $8 billion integrated healthcare organization, serving more than 1 million people each year in over 250 locations throughout Los Angeles and Southern California. With more than 4,500 physicians and nurses—as well as 1,500 active research projects—Cedars-Sinai welcomes over 2,000 patients from over 100 countries every year for their medical care. Cedars-Sinai has been recognized for 10 years in a row on the “Best Hospitals” Honor Roll by U.S. News & World Report. Cedars-Sinai’s sterling reputation and world-class services make it a leading destination for patients worldwide.  As a global leader in healthcare, Cedars-Sinai offers a full range of services to patients from around the world. With passion, skill and integrity, Cedars-Sinai provides patients with access to excellence in healthcare—wherever they may be. The U.S. News & World Report rankings place Cedars-Sinai among the top hospitals in the U.S. in multiple healthcare specialties, including Cardiology, Heart & Vascular Surgery; Gastroenterology & GI Surgery; Diabetes & Endocrinology; Obstetrics & Gynecology; Orthopedics; and Pulmonology & Lung Surgery. Cedars-Sinai is among the top hospitals in the nation in (nationwide rankings are provided in parentheses):Gastroenterology & GI Surgery (No. 2) Orthopedics (No. 5)Pulmonology & Lung Surgery (No. 5)Obstetrics & Gynecology (No. 8)Cardiology, Heart & Vascular Surgery (No. 6)Diabetes & Endocrinology (No. 9)Additionally, Cedars-Sinai received its sixth-consecutive Magnet designation for nursing excellence from the American Nurses Credentialing Center, becoming the hospital with one of the longest-running Magnet designations in the USA.Through its 250+ locations across Southern California, Cedars-Sinai serves the diverse Los Angeles and global communities by setting new standards for quality and innovation in patient care with its pioneering medical research achievements, education programs that are defining the future of healthcare, and wide-ranging community benefit activities.Cedars-Sinai International has a dedicated Patient Services team that speaks multiple languages and focuses specifically on helping our international patients. We provide a range of concierge services to meet the unique needs of patients traveling from outside the USA to receive world-class care and treatment at Cedars-Sinai. Our Global Services team leverages the clinical and nonclinical excellence at Cedars-Sinai to provide a full spectrum of advisory and consulting services that help our partners around the world achieve their strategic goals and thrive in today’s everchanging healthcare environment. Products and Services:  Healthcare provider, clinical and biomedical research, training and education, and telemedicine. Clinical services include gastroenterology and GI surgery; cardiology and heart surgery; orthopaedics, pulmonology and lung surgery; urology; cancer; nephrology; geriatrics; neurology and neurosurgery; transplants; gynecology; ear, nose and throat; pediatrics; diabetes; and endocrinology.
htmlDescription:
Cedars-Sinai is a nonprofit academic medical center and a $8 billion integrated healthcare organization, serving more than 1 million people each year in over 250 locations throughout Los Angeles and Southern California. With more than 4,500 physicians and nurses—as well as 1,500 active research projects—Cedars-Sinai welcomes over 2,000 patients from over 100 countries every year for their medical care.


Cedars-Sinai has been recognized for 10 years in a row on the “Best Hospitals” Honor Roll by U.S. News & World Report. Cedars-Sinai’s sterling reputation and world-class services make it a leading destination for patients worldwide. As a global leader in healthcare, Cedars-Sinai offers a full range of services to patients from around the world. With passion, skill and integrity, Cedars-Sinai provides patients with access to excellence in healthcare—wherever they may be.


The U.S. News & World Report rankings place Cedars-Sinai among the top hospitals in the U.S. in multiple healthcare specialties, including Cardiology, Heart & Vascular Surgery; Gastroenterology & GI Surgery; Diabetes & Endocrinology; Obstetrics & Gynecology; Orthopedics; and Pulmonology & Lung Surgery. Cedars-Sinai is among the top hospitals in the nation in (nationwide rankings are provided in parentheses):

Gastroenterology & GI Surgery (No. 2)

Orthopedics (No. 5)

Pulmonology & Lung Surgery (No. 5)

Obstetrics & Gynecology (No. 8)

Cardiology, Heart & Vascular Surgery (No. 6)

Diabetes & Endocrinology (No. 9)



Additionally, Cedars-Sinai received its sixth-consecutive Magnet designation for nursing excellence from the American Nurses Credentialing Center, becoming the hospital with one of the longest-running Magnet designations in the USA.


Through its 250+ locations across Southern California, Cedars-Sinai serves the diverse Los Angeles and global communities by setting new standards for quality and innovation in patient care with its pioneering medical research achievements, education programs that are defining the future of healthcare, and wide-ranging community benefit activities.


Cedars-Sinai International has a dedicated Patient Services team that speaks multiple languages and focuses specifically on helping our international patients. We provide a range of concierge services to meet the unique needs of patients traveling from outside the USA to receive world-class care and treatment at Cedars-Sinai. Our Global Services team leverages the clinical and nonclinical excellence at Cedars-Sinai to provide a full spectrum of advisory and consulting services that help our partners around the world achieve their strategic goals and thrive in today’s everchanging healthcare environment.


Products and Services: Healthcare provider, clinical and biomedical research, training and education, and telemedicine. Clinical services include gastroenterology and GI surgery; cardiology and heart surgery; orthopaedics, pulmonology and lung surgery; urology; cancer; nephrology; geriatrics; neurology and neurosurgery; transplants; gynecology; ear, nose and throat; pediatrics; diabetes; and endocrinology.

name: Adeahub
description: Modern software to deliver personalized healthcare at scaleAdeaHub is a leading digital healthcare suite, developed by entomo, aimed at facilitating transformative improvements within healthcare systems. Our mission is to deliver personalized healthcare at scale through integrating various platforms aimed at creating more seamless, patient-centered care experiences.Our core solutions include: Digital Front Doors, Health Information Exchange, Hospital Information Systems, and People Experience Platforms. Working closely with our clients, our solutions empower patients with on-demand access to health services, enable rapid and secure health data exchange across the global ecosystem, equip care providers with advanced enterprise management tools, and much more...We've delivered on a national scale through the implementation of platforms such as Malaysia’s MySejahtera application and the UAE’s Reaya platform, serving over 30 million citizens with vaccination health records and services, as well as enabling remote monitoring and real-time outbreak response during COVID-19. AdeaHub also supports the acceleration of global digital health standards through initiatives like the GDHCN Validator, developed for the World Health Organization to create an interoperable network of healthcare information.Today, AdeaHub operates across Asia and the Middle East, looking to expand and support governments, international organizations, and healthcare businesses in advancing proactive, precise, and patient-focused care delivery.
htmlDescription:
Modern software to deliver personalized healthcare at scale

AdeaHub is a leading digital healthcare suite, developed by entomo, aimed at facilitating transformative improvements within healthcare systems. Our mission is to deliver personalized healthcare at scale through integrating various platforms aimed at creating more seamless, patient-centered care experiences.

Our core solutions include: Digital Front Doors, Health Information Exchange, Hospital Information Systems, and People Experience Platforms. Working closely with our clients, our solutions empower patients with on-demand access to health services, enable rapid and secure health data exchange across the global ecosystem, equip care providers with advanced enterprise management tools, and much more...

We've delivered on a national scale through the implementation of platforms such as Malaysia’s MySejahtera application and the UAE’s Reaya platform, serving over 30 million citizens with vaccination health records and services, as well as enabling remote monitoring and real-time outbreak response during COVID-19. AdeaHub also supports the acceleration of global digital health standards through initiatives like the GDHCN Validator, developed for the World Health Organization to create an interoperable network of healthcare information.

Today, AdeaHub operates across Asia and the Middle East, looking to expand and support governments, international organizations, and healthcare businesses in advancing proactive, precise, and patient-focused care delivery.

name: Ankara Chamber Of Commerce
description: Founded in 1923, the Ankara Chamber of Commerce (ATO) is Türkiye’s second-largest chamber of commerce, representing more than 170,000 member companies. As the umbrella organization of Ankara’s business community—the capital of the Republic of Türkiye—ATO represents its members operating in over 2,200 different business sectors through 68 professional committees and 14 specialized commissions.ATO works to enhance the competitiveness of its members, create new market opportunities, and promote Ankara’s economic potential on a global scale. The Chamber carries out strategic initiatives in key areas such as international trade, tourism, health, and digital transformation, and hosts major international events including the “Geographical Indications Summit” and the “Ankara Brand Meetings.”Standing out with its efforts in health, congress, and fair tourism, ATO established the “Ankara Convention & Visitors Bureau” to strengthen the international promotion of Ankara and launched the “Health Ankara” brand to showcase the city’s healthcare potential to global markets.The Congresium, Ankara’s largest convention and exhibition center, is owned and operated by ATO, hosting numerous national and international events. Additionally, ATO is a stakeholder in the establishment of an international fair organization currently under development.ATO also leads projects that make a mark on the international stage. Its AI-powered chatbot project, “ATONET Smart Assistant,” was awarded World Champion in the “Best Chamber Innovation Project” category at the 14th World Chambers Congress organized by the World Chambers Federation (WCF) as part of the 2025 World Chambers Competition. The Chamber had previously achieved first place in the same category in 2023 with its ATONET mobile application.Continuing its mission to support Türkiye’s sustainable economic growth, strengthen Ankara’s position in global trade networks, and create new opportunities for its members, ATO remains a key driver of innovation and international collaboration.
htmlDescription:
Founded in 1923, the Ankara Chamber of Commerce (ATO) is Türkiye’s second-largest chamber of commerce, representing more than 170,000 member companies. As the umbrella organization of Ankara’s business community—the capital of the Republic of Türkiye—ATO represents its members operating in over 2,200 different business sectors through 68 professional committees and 14 specialized commissions.

ATO works to enhance the competitiveness of its members, create new market opportunities, and promote Ankara’s economic potential on a global scale. The Chamber carries out strategic initiatives in key areas such as international trade, tourism, health, and digital transformation, and hosts major international events including the “Geographical Indications Summit” and the “Ankara Brand Meetings.”

Standing out with its efforts in health, congress, and fair tourism, ATO established the “Ankara Convention & Visitors Bureau” to strengthen the international promotion of Ankara and launched the “Health Ankara” brand to showcase the city’s healthcare potential to global markets.

The Congresium, Ankara’s largest convention and exhibition center, is owned and operated by ATO, hosting numerous national and international events. Additionally, ATO is a stakeholder in the establishment of an international fair organization currently under development.

ATO also leads projects that make a mark on the international stage. Its AI-powered chatbot project, “ATONET Smart Assistant,” was awarded World Champion in the “Best Chamber Innovation Project” category at the 14th World Chambers Congress organized by the World Chambers Federation (WCF) as part of the 2025 World Chambers Competition. The Chamber had previously achieved first place in the same category in 2023 with its ATONET mobile application.

Continuing its mission to support Türkiye’s sustainable economic growth, strengthen Ankara’s position in global trade networks, and create new opportunities for its members, ATO remains a key driver of innovation and international collaboration.

name: Elsevier LTD
description: A global leader in advanced information and decision support, Elsevier helps to advance science and healthcare, to advance human progress. We do this by facilitating insights and critical decision-making with innovative solutions based on trusted, evidence-based content and advanced AI-enabled digital technologies. We have supported the work of our research and healthcare communities for more than 140 years. Our 9,700 employees around the world, including 2,300 technologists, are dedicated to supporting researchers, librarians, academic leaders, funders, governments, R&D-intensive companies, doctors, nurses, future healthcare professionals and educators in their critical work. Our 3,000 scientific journals and iconic reference books include the foremost titles in their fields, including Cell Press, The Lancet and Gray’s Anatomy. Together with the Elsevier Foundation, we work in partnership with the communities we serve to advance inclusion in science, research and healthcare in developing countries and around the world.  Elsevier is part of RELX, a global provider of information-based analytics and decision tools for professional and business customers. For more information on our work, digital solutions and content, visit www.elsevier.com.
htmlDescription:
A global leader in advanced information and decision support, Elsevier helps to advance science and healthcare, to advance human progress. We do this by facilitating insights and critical decision-making with innovative solutions based on trusted, evidence-based content and advanced AI-enabled digital technologies.

We have supported the work of our research and healthcare communities for more than 140 years. Our 9,700 employees around the world, including 2,300 technologists, are dedicated to supporting researchers, librarians, academic leaders, funders, governments, R&D-intensive companies, doctors, nurses, future healthcare professionals and educators in their critical work. Our 3,000 scientific journals and iconic reference books include the foremost titles in their fields, including Cell Press, The Lancet and Gray’s Anatomy. Together with the Elsevier Foundation, we work in partnership with the communities we serve to advance inclusion in science, research and healthcare in developing countries and around the world.

Elsevier is part of RELX, a global provider of information-based analytics and decision tools for professional and business customers. For more information on our work, digital solutions and content, visit www.elsevier.com.

name: SEDCO
description: SEDCO stands as a leading provider of smart health solutions across the region. At Global Health 2025, we’re showcasing our latest innovations:• Telehealth Pod: A private, fully equipped smart pod that can be placed anywhere, giving patients instant access to remote doctors and vital health checks.• Patient Experience Management: Smart queuing, self-registration, and check-in solutions that streamline patient flow and reduce waiting times.• Teleconsultation: A mobile-based video consultation solution that enables doctors to connect with patients anytime, anywhere—perfect for remote and follow-up visits beyond hospital walls.SEDCO is trusted by healthcare institutions for over 40 years and fully aligned with the Kingdom’s Vision 2030. Empowering hospitals, clinics, and healthcare centers to enhance patient experience, improve efficiency, and accelerate digital transformation.
htmlDescription:
SEDCO stands as a leading provider of smart health solutions across the region. At Global Health 2025, we’re showcasing our latest innovations:

• Telehealth Pod: A private, fully equipped smart pod that can be placed anywhere, giving patients instant access to remote doctors and vital health checks.

• Patient Experience Management: Smart queuing, self-registration, and check-in solutions that streamline patient flow and reduce waiting times.

• Teleconsultation: A mobile-based video consultation solution that enables doctors to connect with patients anytime, anywhere—perfect for remote and follow-up visits beyond hospital walls.

SEDCO is trusted by healthcare institutions for over 40 years and fully aligned with the Kingdom’s Vision 2030. Empowering hospitals, clinics, and healthcare centers to enhance patient experience, improve efficiency, and accelerate digital transformation.

name: HHD Home Health Care L.L.C.
description: HHD Home Health Care is a home hemodialysis treatment for patients with kidney chronic disease. It was launched in 2013 in United Arab Emirates and after successfully completing thousands of event-free kidney dialysis sessions in the UAE. We started expanding our business in 2019 starting from Saudi Arabia, Kuwait and other GCC countries. HHD Home Health Care has acquired many international accreditations from authority bodies such as ACHC international (Accreditation Commission for Health Care) previously, ISO 9001: 2015 (International Organization for Standardization) and in progress with JCI (Joint Commission International) preparedness.As a pioneer in HHD treatment in the region, we make your health and well-being our priority! Our goal is to provide, patients with kidney disorders, a high-quality home-based hemodialysis treatment. Our team of nephrologists and dialysis nurses are highly trained and ready to deliver a full range of modern solutions in a safe and comfortable environment. We use the latest groundbreaking technology of portable kidney dialysis machines. This enables our patients to receive top grade treatment while remaining at their ease and comfort of their home.We also provide advanced health services for travelers coming from different parts of the world, and citizens traveling to Riyad, Jeddah, Makkah, Gazan and all over the United Arab Emirates.
htmlDescription:
HHD Home Health Care is a home hemodialysis treatment for patients with kidney chronic disease. It was launched in 2013 in United Arab Emirates and after successfully completing thousands of event-free kidney dialysis sessions in the UAE. We started expanding our business in 2019 starting from Saudi Arabia, Kuwait and other GCC countries. HHD Home Health Care has acquired many international accreditations from authority bodies such as ACHC international (Accreditation Commission for Health Care) previously, ISO 9001: 2015 (International Organization for Standardization) and in progress with JCI (Joint Commission International) preparedness.


As a pioneer in HHD treatment in the region, we make your health and well-being our priority! Our goal is to provide, patients with kidney disorders, a high-quality home-based hemodialysis treatment. Our team of nephrologists and dialysis nurses are highly trained and ready to deliver a full range of modern solutions in a safe and comfortable environment. We use the latest groundbreaking technology of portable kidney dialysis machines. This enables our patients to receive top grade treatment while remaining at their ease and comfort of their home.


We also provide advanced health services for travelers coming from different parts of the world, and citizens traveling to Riyad, Jeddah, Makkah, Gazan and all over the United Arab Emirates.

htmlDescription:
FORMED, a professional factory of medical devices since 2011, located in Hangzhou city, Zhejiang province, southern of the China. Focuses on the development, research, production, sales and technical support of medical devices.

Our product family include Anaesthesia, Gastroenterology and Urology. Our main products cover Laryngeal Mask, Intubation Introducer & Bougie, Catheter Mount, Guedel Airway, Oxygen Management, Intermittent Catheter and Foley Catheter etc. It is also available to cooperate with customers to design new products.

name: Jodismed China
description: Hangzhou Superds Industry Co., Ltd.( JodisMed ), located in Hangzhou China, is a professional manufacturer and supplier specializing in developing and producing medical disposables of respiratory care and anesthesia care.JodisMed covers an area of 10,000 m² including 1,000 m² clean room of class 100,000. We ensure our quality with advanced technology, stringent quality control system and skilled team.JodisMed has achieved ISO 13485, CE, FDA listed and China GMP. We strive ourselves to fulfill the needs of customers with high-quality medical products and service. We've served OEM and ODM globally since 2009.JodisMed sincerely hopes to build a long, happy and reliable relationship with you.
htmlDescription:
Hangzhou Superds Industry Co., Ltd.( JodisMed ), located in Hangzhou China, is a professional manufacturer and supplier specializing in developing and producing medical disposables of respiratory care and anesthesia care.

JodisMed covers an area of 10,000 m² including 1,000 m² clean room of class 100,000. We ensure our quality with advanced technology, stringent quality control system and skilled team.

JodisMed has achieved ISO 13485, CE, FDA listed and China GMP. We strive ourselves to fulfill the needs of customers with high-quality medical products and service. We've served OEM and ODM globally since 2009.

JodisMed sincerely hopes to build a long, happy and reliable relationship with you.

name: Salehiya Healthcare Company
description: Since 1964, we at Salehiya have been a pillar of Saudi healthcare. Inspired by Vision 2030, we are committed to elevate the healthcare experience across the Kingdom. منذ عام 1964م، ونحن في الصالحية ركيزة أساسية لقطاع الرعاية الصحية في المملكة. نقدم الأدوية الحيوية  وتقنيات الصحة المبتكرة ، مدعومين بسلسلة إمداد رقمية متقدمة. مستلهمين من رؤية 2030، نلتزم بالارتقاء بتجربة الرعايةالصحية في المملكة.
htmlDescription:
Since 1964, we at Salehiya have been a pillar of Saudi healthcare. We deliver critical pharmaceuticals and innovative medical technologies , all supported by our digitally advanced supply chain. Inspired by Vision 2030, we are committed to elevate the healthcare experience across the Kingdom. 

منذ عام 1964م، ونحن في الصالحية ركيزة أساسية لقطاع الرعاية الصحية في المملكة. نقدم الأدوية الحيوية  وتقنيات الصحة المبتكرة ، مدعومين بسلسلة إمداد رقمية متقدمة. مستلهمين من رؤية 2030، نلتزم بالارتقاء بتجربة الرعايةالصحية في المملكة.
